item.title: Mad Midget Music Episode 8
item.itunes:author: DJ Jpeg
item.itunes:summary:
On the day that Wake the Nation went truly global and we were listened to in countries all over the world! Countries like the USA, Canada, Peru, Spain, Ireland, Sweden, Germany, Holland, Finland, Denmark, Italy & France! Even AUSTRALIA!!
Welcome to Wake the Nation Radio & Mad Midget Music!
Music From; The Hyper Tensions Lost Without Cause Rusty G's Vomit Whores Young Influential Craig Hudson Polly Barrett
tinyurl.com/wtnradio

item.title: Mad Midget Music Episode 6
item.itunes:author: DJ Jpeg
item.itunes:summary:
Long, Long ago. In a time before the internet and before mp3s.
There was no easy way to hear unsigned music (except for John Peel, on a Saturday night and then, let's face it, you were probably out on the piss...).
But Then!
Out of the darkness a voice said;
"Let there be Wake the Nation Radio!"
And it was good!
And then some other smart alec said;
"Actually, I'd like to specialise in bands from the UK & Ireland!"
So here, in the comfort of you're own home (or office...), Is your host...
Hacker!
And...
Mad Midget Music!
Music by; Drymouth 3 Days of Freedom Polly Barrett Mckenna Mockingbird Jewels Lindt StOp, sToP
http://www.tinyurl.com/wtnradio

item.title: Mad Midget Music Episode 5
item.itunes:author: DJ Jpeg
item.itunes:summary:
Internet Radio, a joy for your ears.
These are the musings of Hacker's Mad Midget Music.
Our continuing mission; To seek out new songs, to find new unsigned artists and to promote unabashed happiness where ever we go!
To blindly go where no show has gone before!!
Music By: Ego Trip Skarlett Riot Apple Shift Seven StOp, sToP Pearl Handled Revolver Polly Barrett The Victoria Perks Band
http://www.tinyurl.com/wtnradio
